thread.title: Betty Brueske
thread.title_full: Shop Orthopedics reviewed by Betty Brueske

author: Betty Brueske
title: Betty Brueske
text: Haven't had this brace very long, but so far, it is exactly what I had hoped for. I have dropped foot from MS, resulting in frequent falls despite rigerous PT, several different orthotics and mental focus on lifting that foot. So far, with brace, haven't fallen, and this brace seems to lift my foot enough to prevent stumbling.
